payment-list.title: Список переводов между счетами
payment-list.hql-query: select payment from com.rssl.phizic.business.documents.payments.ExtendedLoanClaim as payment where payment.formName = 'ExtendedLoanClaim' and payment.owner.id = :loginId and (:state is null or :state = '' or payment.state.code = :state) and (:fromDate is null or payment.dateCreated >= :fromDate) and (:toDate is null or payment.dateCreated <= :toDate ) order by payment.dateCreated asc, payment.id desc
